TopicTitle: Hi - New to game and forums

Articles.Content:
Been playing for hours and I can't seem to land on the mun. Heck, for the first 8+ hours, I couldn't even make it into orbit of Kerbin. I've restarted several times. It's frustrating, but hopefully, I'll get it figured out.

I'm really just introducing myself.

8 hours to orbit? Man you are doing good, no really for a newcomer to the game that is really good. Are you playing in career mode? If so maybe you could try sandbox with some of the bigger parts. Just don't get overwhelmed by the number of them, in anycase welcome to the community, snacks are on the left, if you need anything just ask around I'm sure somene will help out, oh and extra boosters are up the stairs to the right. Have fun!
Welcome aboard, TrickyNick, and always remember that the Forum is the best place for finding help!
